name: Haunted Mansion (itch)
description:
You are a Real State agent who visits an old abandoned mansion to assess its market value and put it on sale, but when you are inside it, checking some of its ancient artifacts, you pass out and wake up in a room.... what surprises await you in the mansion? Every time you play there will be a new adventure!

Credits
  • Design, Code and Integration by Santiago Zapata
  • Game Art by Giovanny Ramirez
  • Cutscenes by Bombillo Amarillo
  • Ambient Music and Sound Effects by Ashton Morris
7DRL Challenge disclaimersUsed Assets
  • Intro cutscene images were reused from an old scraped project from 2012.
